m_szDocTitle: Tesla Model 3 Spotted In The Wild In California (VIDEO) | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Tesla Model 3 Spotted In The Wild In California (VIDEO) April 2nd, 2016 by Kyle Field   After years of successfully keeping the Model 3 under wraps, it seems that the secret is out and Tesla is taking Model 3 to the streets. Numerous reports  of the Model 3 are hitting social media networks this morning, showing the car roaming public streets in daylight, flaunting its newfound celebrity status. A silver Tesla Model 3 is pictured following a Tesla Model S that has been fitted with a rear hatch–mounted camera system zooming down a main street in Marina del Rey, California, which is a beach town
